articles.description: With 14 French Open titles now to his name, the sporting world is running out of superlatives to describe Rafael Nadal.

articles.author: Zach Dean, Daytona Beach News-Journal Online
articles.title: Ross Chastain needs '(expletive) whooped', Hamlin vows payback, Chase Elliott gets warning - Daytona Beach News-Journal
articles.description: NASCAR went to St. Louis and it delivered, giving us drama, some more drama, and just a little more drama! Buckle up, Ross Chastain.
articles.content:
